label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• AddedArcane Rune
    • Causes all spell cooldowns to be reduced by 30% and mana costs to be reduced by 50%
    • Lasts 50 seconds

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Random Drafthero pool increased from 24 to 50

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added Random Draft toRanked Matchmaking

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Random Draft now uses the same picking mechanics as Ranked All Pick

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • RankedAll Pickinitial pre-picking time reduced from 15 to 5

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Creep bounty increases by 1 gold per normal upgrade cycle
    • I.e. every 7 minutes 30 seconds

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Creeps now arrive slightly closer to the top Dire tower and bottom Radiant tower

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Centaur Coursernow has a stacking magic resistance aura (20% for units, 5% for heroes)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Hellbearnow has a stacking magic resistance aura (20% for units, 5% for heroes)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Dragonhide Aura's stackable armor increased from 2 to 3

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient Dragonsarmor reduced by 1

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient neutralsnow behave like normal neutrals and split experience with all heroes in the AoE

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new ability toAncient Black Dragon,Fireball

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Ancient Thunderhide'sFrenzyis now unit targetable

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Hill Troll Priest'sMana Auraincreased from 2 to 3

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Satyr Banisher'sPurgecooldown reduced from 5 to 3 seconds

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Satyr Tormenter'sUnholy AuraHP regen increased from 4 to 6

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Satyr Tormenter'sShockwavedistance increased from 800 to 1200

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Satyr Tormenter's Shockwave speed reduced from 1050 to 900

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Satyr Tormenter's Shockwave damage increased 125 to 160

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Dark Troll Summoner's andHill Troll's attack range reduced from 500 to 400

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Dark Troll Summoner's attack damage increased by 6

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Roshan's base armor increased by 1

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Roshan'sBase Attack Timeincreased from 1 to 2

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Roshan now has +100 Attack Speed
    • He still attacks at the same rate, but is affected less by negative attack speed

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added aPatrolcommand

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • You are now able to bring up the targeting cursor when silenced, and instead get the error upon targeting rather than clicking the button

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Single Target spells with AoE effects now have a new targeting UI
    • Abilities likeFrost Nova,Storm Bolt, etc.

label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Siege damageagainst heroes increased from 75% to 85%
    • Towers and Siege units do approximately 13% more damage to heroes
    • E.g. Level 1 tower damage against heroes effectively increased from 82.5 to 93.5

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Towers no longer have a very minor experience bounty (previously was 25 XP that split evenly in an area)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Hero base HP increased from 150 to 180

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Simplified some minor damage and armor types

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new neutral hard camp for each team, near their respective Secret Shops

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a small ramp from the Radiant Secret Shop to the ward spot right above it

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Moved the Radiant hard camp closer to the Dire offlane

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Swapped Medium and Hard camp in Radiant Jungle

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new pathway from Radiant mid to Radiant jungle

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a ramp connecting the Radiant jungle to the area near Roshan

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Created a walkable pathway to the Radiant rune ward

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Created a new juke spot behind the Dire Secret Shop

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Expanded Terrain around the top Tier 2 Radiant tower

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Moved the bottom rune up a little bit

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Radiant middle tier 1 tower has been moved back

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Adjusted Radiant small camp spawn box

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new ward spot near the Radiant ancients (does not reveal top rune)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Created a new pathway leading to the wardspot below the Radiant Secret Shop

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Moved the Radiant ramp leading to the top rune further away from the rune (slightly closer to mid lane)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Moved the Dire ramp leading to the top rune closer up

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Adjusted the terrain and the ramp going down from the Radiant Ancients slightly

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Improved jukability in the terrain around the Dire side shop

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a path through the trees at Radiant offlane sideshop moving south and added juke paths

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new ward spot to the right of the top tier 1 Radiant tower

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a couple of trees to right of the ramp leading down from the Radiant ancients (covering some vision to the left of it)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Dire is now able to enter the jungle through the middle Radiant ramp and walk to the side without being in range to dispel their smoke

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new pathway above the top Dire side shop

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Created a new pathway in the middle of the long column of trees at the bottom Radiant Tier 2 area

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a walkable path to the ward spot near bottom rune

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Reduced the size of the pull camp box on the Dire safelane hard camp

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a pathable walkway from the cliff above the top rune to the Dire area to the right of it

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new pathway to the south of the bottom side shop

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a couple of trees in the Dire base between the mid and top towers along the ledge

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Adjusted juke paths near the Radiant ward spot near the hard camp

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new juke spot to the south of the bottom Radiant hard camp

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a hiding spot in the Dire middle lane near the edge of the Secret Shop

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added some trees below the top Radiant T2 tower

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Adjusted trees to the left of the Dire offlane (affecting visibility of heroes coming from the left)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a pathway above the Radiant Ancient (leading up to the new ward spot)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Adjusted Dire secret shop location slightly

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Adjusted the terrain pathing a little bit around the loop where the Radiant bottom left ward spot is

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Adjusted tree layout of the high ground to the right of the Radiant middle camp

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Moved Radiant ramp to the bottom rune back a little bit

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added hiding spots in the clump of trees above the formerly Radiant hard camp (now the Radiant medium camp)

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Nudged the Radiant small camp down very slightly

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Moved the Radiant mid medium camp down slightly and adjusted nearby trees

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new hiding spot on the Dire bottom lane, in the area higher ground to the right of the Dire Ancients

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Adjusted the position of the Radiant middle ramp slightly

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Added a new juke spot to the terrain to the right of the Radiant small camp

label: General updates
descriptionHtml: • Adjusted tree pathway and added a couple of hiding spots above the top Dire T2 tower

label: Alchemist
descriptionHtml:
• Greevil's GreedBounty Rune multiplier rescaled from 5× to 3/4/5/6×
  • Fixed Greevil's Greed granting full gold during Buyback gold penalty phase

label: Arc Warden
descriptionHtml: • Spark Wraithmana cost increased from 50 to 100/110/120/130

label: Bane
descriptionHtml: • Movement speed reduced from 315 to 310

label: Batrider
descriptionHtml:
• Base HP regeneration increased from 0.25 to 2
  • Flamebreakmana cost reduced from 140 to 110/120/130/140

label: Beastmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Wild Axesno longer has unit targeting
  • Call of the Wildcooldown rescaled from 40 to 42/38/34/30

label: Bloodseeker
descriptionHtml: • Blood Ritecooldown rescaled from 29/26/23/20 to 30/25/20/15

label: Bounty Hunter
descriptionHtml: • Jinadamovement and attack speed reduction increased from 25% to 25/27/29/31%

label: Brewmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Drunken Hazecooldown reduced from 8 to 8/7/6/5
  • Primal Split'sDispel Magicdamage to summons increased from 200 to 500
  • Primal Split's Dispel Magic cooldown reduced from 6 to 4
  • Primal Split'sWind Walkcooldown reduced from 7 to 5

label: Bristleback
descriptionHtml:
• Added Scepter to Bristleback
    • Nasal Goois no longer targeted, instead it applies Goo to all enemies around you in 600 AoE when cast
  • Viscous Nasal Goomana cost reduced from 30 to 25
  • Quill Spraymax damage increased from 400 to 450

label: Broodmother
descriptionHtml: • Spawn Spiderlingsdamage reduced from 75/150/225/300 to 70/140/210/280

label: Centaur Warrunner
descriptionHtml: • Returndamage increased from 30/42/54/66 to 30/45/60/75%

label: Chaos Knight
descriptionHtml: • Reality Riftbonus damage increased from 60/80/100/120 to 60/100/140/180

label: Chen
descriptionHtml:
• Base strength increased from 20 to 23
  • Penitencemana cost reduced from 100 to 70
  • Penitence duration increased from 5/6/7/8 to 8

label: Clinkz
descriptionHtml: • Agility growth increased from 3 to 3.3

label: Clockwerk
descriptionHtml:
• Strength growth increased from 2.7 to 2.9
  • Power Cogsnow spawn in a circle rather than a rectangle

label: Crystal Maiden
descriptionHtml:
• Crystal Novacooldown reduced from 13 to 12
  • Arcane Auralevel 4 mana regen increased from 2.5/5 (allies/self) to 3/6

label: Dark Seer
descriptionHtml:
• Base intelligence reduced from 27 to 25
  • Ion Shellis nowpurgeable

label: Dazzle
descriptionHtml:
• Poison Touchmana cost reduced from 100 to 70
  • Shallow Gravecast point increased from 0.3 to 0.35
  • Shallow Grave mana cost increased from 140/130/120/110 to 150
  • Weaveno longer provides 800flying vision. Now providesground visionfor the AoE of the ability for 3 seconds

label: Death Prophet
descriptionHtml:
• Temporarily removed from Captains Mode
  • ReplacedWitchcraftwith a new ability,Spirit Siphon

label: Doom
descriptionHtml:
• Temporarily removed from Captains Mode
  • ReplacedLevel Deathwith a new ability,Infernal Blade

label: Dragon Knight
descriptionHtml:
• Dragon BloodHP regen increased from 2/3/4/5 to 3/6/9/12
  • Elder Dragon FormFrost AoE increased from 250 to 300
    • Same AoE as the splash damage

label: Drow Ranger
descriptionHtml:
• Added Scepter to Drow Ranger
    • Marksmanshipnow causes her attacks to splinter on the target and split into two arrows affecting two random units in a 375 radius
    • The splintered arrows deal 50% damage each
    • Primary target still takes full damage
    • The split arrows act as normal attacks, carrying allattack modifiers

label: Earth Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Enabled Earth Spirit in Captains Mode
  • Intelligence growth reduced from 2.4 to 2.1
  • Boulder Smashstun AoE reduced from 200 to 160
  • Geomagnetic Gripcan now only pull allied heroes when using Scepter

label: Elder Titan
descriptionHtml:
• Earth Splitterdamage rescaled from 35% to 30/40/50%
  • Earth Splitter mana cost rescaled from 175 to 125/175/225
  • Earth Splitter's physical damage component is no longer reduced by Damage Block

label: Ember Spirit
descriptionHtml: • Fire Remnantsno longer give vision

label: Enchantress
descriptionHtml: • Enchantcooldown reduced from 30/25/20/15 to 30/24/18/12

label: Enigma
descriptionHtml:
• Eidolonmovement speed increased from 250/250/260/260 to 260/280/300/320
  • Maleficedamage increased from 25/40/55/70 to 30/50/70/90
  • Black Holecooldown reduced from 200/190/180 to 200/180/160

label: Faceless Void
descriptionHtml:
• Temporarily removed from Captains Mode
  • ReplacedBacktrackwith a new ability,Time Dilation

label: Gyrocopter
descriptionHtml: • Call Down's first missile damage reduced from 250/300/350 to 220/285/350

label: Huskar
descriptionHtml:
• Berserker's Bloodbonuses are provided linearly from full until 10% HP (rather than stepwise at 7% increments)
  • Berserker's Blood maximum magic resistance reduced from 42/56/70/84% to 20/30/40/50%

label: Invoker
descriptionHtml:
• Invoker now starts withInvokeLevel 1 at the beginning of the game
  • Invoke now has the standard 6/11/16 leveling
  • Level 25 invoker (since he is now missing an ability level) has an attribute bonus ability that grants 6 all stats

label: Jakiro
descriptionHtml: • Base damage increased by 7

label: Keeper of the Light
descriptionHtml:
• Chakra Magiccooldown reduction increased from 2/3/4/5 to 3/4/5/6
  • Chakra Magic buff duration increased from 12 to 15 seconds
  • Chakra Magic now restores and increases mana capacity by 75/150/225/300

label: Kunkka
descriptionHtml:
• Added Scepter to Kunkka
    • Ghost Ship now drags enemies within a 200 AoE of it towards the crash site
    • It now starts from where you are, rather than behind you, lands in the same position it normally would have
    • Enemies are still able to perform actions while being pulled by the Ghost Ship
    • Works similar to Drow Ranger'sGustknockback
  • Torrentnow gives your team vision over target area immediately upon cast, rather than just when triggering
  • Tidebringeris now anautocastability, will only trigger if turned on or cast directly on the target
  • Tidebringer damage bonus increased from 20/35/50/65 to 25/40/55/70
  • Tidebringer AoE from rescaled 500/500/500/600 to 450/500/550/600
  • Ghost Shipmana cost reduced from 150/200/250 to 125/175/225

label: Legion Commander
descriptionHtml:
• Moment of Couragecooldown reduced from 2.7/2.1/1.5/0.9 to 2.6/2/1.4/0.8
  • Legion Commander's Scepter now makes you and your target immune to all damage unless the source is between theDuelparticipants.
  • Legion Commander's Scepter duration is now 4.75/5.5/6.25

label: Lifestealer
descriptionHtml:
• Rageattack speed bonus increased from 30/45/60/80 to 50/60/70/80
  • Feastdamage and lifesteal increased from 4/5/6/7% to 4.5/5.5/6.5/7.5%
  • Infestcooldown reduced from 100 to 100/75/50

label: Lion
descriptionHtml:
• Earth Spikemana cost reduced from 100/120/145/170 to 100/120/140/160
  • Earth Spike duration increased from 1.02/1.52/2.02/2.52 to 1.1/1.6/2.1/2.6
  • Mana Drainreduced cooldown from 20/15/10/5 to 16/12/8/4

label: Lone Druid
descriptionHtml:
• Temporarily removed from Captains Mode
  • ReplacedSynergywith a new ability for Lone Druid,Savage Roar

label: Luna
descriptionHtml:
• Turn rateincreased from 0.4 to 0.6
  • EclipseScepter beam interval reduced from 0.6 to 0.3

label: Lycan
descriptionHtml:
• Lycan WolvesandShapeshiftno longer grant critical strike
  • Lycan Wolves now gainCrippleat level 2, granting a 20% chance to cripple the target, causing it to take 8 damage per second and lose 40 Attack Speed for 4 seconds.
  • Shapeshift now grants all units under your control a 40% chance for 1.4/1.6/1.8x critical strike

label: Magnus
descriptionHtml:
• Added Scepter to Magnus
    • ChangesEmpowerto be an allied hero aura
    • Affects ranged heroes for half values and causes them to deal splash damage around the target in a 200 AoE
    • Can still be cast on units, but does not stack
  • Skewerdistance increased from 750/900/1050/1200 to 900/1000/1100/1200
  • Skewer slow reduced from 40% to 25/30/35/40%
  • Skewer slow duration increased from 2.5 to 2.5/2.75/3/3.25 seconds

label: Medusa
descriptionHtml:
• Mystic Snakeno longer increases manasteal per jump
  • Mystic Snake manasteal is now 11/14/17/20% of total mana

label: Meepo
descriptionHtml: • Double Damageno longer affects all Meepo units

label: Mirana
descriptionHtml:
• Attack range increased from 600 to 630
  • Starstormradius increased from 625 to 650
  • Sacred Arrownow instantly kills the first unit it hits if it is a non-ancient creep

label: Morphling
descriptionHtml:
• Adaptive Strikebase damage increased from 50/60/70/80 to 100
  • Adaptive Strike mana cost reduced from 100 to 100/90/80/70
  • Morphrate increased from 2/4/6/10 per second to 2/4/8/16
  • Morph now shifts in intervals of 1 rather than 2
    • This doesn't affect the rate of change, just smoothness
  • Hybridcooldown reduced from 140 to 120

label: Naga Siren
descriptionHtml: • Base Intelligence increased from 18 + 1.95 to 21 + 2

label: Nature's Prophet
descriptionHtml:
• Base intelligence increased by 4
  • Treantdamage increased from 28 to 32
    • This means Greater Treant damage is increased from 84 to 96

label: Necrophos
descriptionHtml: • Base armor increased by 1

label: Night Stalker
descriptionHtml: • Voidslow at night reduced from 4 to 2.5/3/3.5/4 seconds

label: Nyx Assassin
descriptionHtml:
• NyxImpaleduration increased from 1.27/1.77/2.27/2.77 to 1.6/2/2.4/2.8
  • Spiked Carapacecooldown reduced from 23/20/17/14 to 22/18/14/10

label: Ogre Magi
descriptionHtml: • Base health regen increased from 2.5 to 3.5

label: Oracle
descriptionHtml:
• Enabled Oracle in Captains Mode
  • Fate's Edictcooldown rescaled from 12 to 16/13/10/7
  • Fate's Edict duration reduced from 3/4/5/6 to 3/3.5/4/4.5
  • Fate's Edict cast range rescaled from 700 to 500/600/700/800
  • Fortune's Endmana cost reduced from 130 to 110
  • Fortune's End can now target allies
    • Does notrootor hurt the ally, but purges and applies the effect in the area
  • False Promiseno longer continuously dispels after the initial cast
    • It previously continuously removed all debuffs including stuns
  • False Promise duration increased from 6/7/8 to 7/8/9
  • False Promise cooldown rescaled from 80/60/40 to 90/60/30
  • False Promise mana cost reduced from 200 to 100

label: Outworld Devourer
descriptionHtml:
• Reworked howAstral Imprisonmentworks
    • Astral Imprisonment now deals damage to enemies in an area around the target when it ends
    • The target itself will also take damage, if it is an enemy
    • Deals 75/150/225/300 magic damage
    • Affects a 400 area
    • You are only hurt once by this AoE with Scepter
    • No longer steals intelligence
    • Can now be targeted on creeps
  • Astral Imprisonment cooldown rescaled from 18/16/14/12 to 20/17/14/11
  • Astral Imprisonment cast range rescaled from 500 to 450/500/550/600
  • Astral Imprisonment duration increased from 1/2/3/4 to 4
  • Essence AuraAoE reduced from 1000 to the standard 900 aura radius
  • Arcane Orbnow steals 0/1/2/3 intelligence per hit for 40 seconds (heroes only)
  • Outworld Devourer intelligence growth reduced from 3.3 to 2.7

label: Phantom Assassin
descriptionHtml: • Base Intelligence increased from 13 + 1 to 15 + 1.4

label: Phoenix
descriptionHtml:
• Sun Rayturn rate increased from 20 to 25
  • Supernovadamage per second increased from 60/80/100 to 60/90/120

label: Puck
descriptionHtml:
• Illusory Orbmana cost reduced from 150 to 80/100/120/140
  • Illusory Orb cooldown increased from 11 to 14/13/12/11
  • Waning Riftcooldown reduced from 16 to 16/15/14/13
  • Waning Rift no longer only silences heroes

label: Pudge
descriptionHtml:
• Reworked Scepter on Pudge
    • Reduces cooldown ofMeat Hookto 4 seconds and increases damage from 360 to 475
    • Note: No longer grants previous Scepter bonuses
  • Dismemberdamage from 75/125/175 to 60/90/120 +30/40/50% of strength
  • Dismember now heals you for the damage it does

label: Pugna
descriptionHtml: • Decrepifyno longer slows allies

label: Queen of Pain
descriptionHtml:
• Scream of Paindamage reduced from 85/165/225/300 to 75/150/225/300
  • Sonic Wavetravel speed reduced from 1100 to 900

label: Riki
descriptionHtml:
• Temporarily removed from Captains Mode
  • ReworkedPermanent Invisibilityto include Backstab

label: Rubick
descriptionHtml: • Fade Boltattack damage reduction increased from 14/20/26/32 to 20/25/30/35

label: Sand King
descriptionHtml:
• Reworked Scepter on Sand King
    • DoublesBurrowstrikecast range and appliesCaustic Finalepoison to heroes
    • Note: No longer grants previous Scepter bonuses
  • Base strength increased from 18 to 21
  • Caustic Finaleslow increased from 25% to 30%

label: Shadow Demon
descriptionHtml: • Disruptionillusions duration from 5/6/7/8 to 6/8/10/12 seconds

label: Shadow Fiend
descriptionHtml:
• Added Scepter to Shadow Fiend
    • Requiem of Soulswaves now return back to Shadow Fiend dealing 40% damage on the way back
    • All of the damage the Requiem does to heroes on its way back heals you
  • Base armor reduced by 1
  • Shadowrazemana cost increased from 75 to 90

label: Shadow Shaman
descriptionHtml:
• Shacklestotal damage increased from 120/180/240/300 to 120/200/280/360
  • Mass Serpent Wardsrequire 2 hits to destroy
    • Previously had 135/150/150 hp

label: Silencer
descriptionHtml: • ReplacedCurse of the Silentwith a new ability,Arcane Curse

label: Skywrath Mage
descriptionHtml: • Concussive Shotmana cost reduced from 110 to 95

label: Slardar
descriptionHtml: • Amplify Damagenow only reveals the target rather than the area around it

label: Storm Spirit
descriptionHtml: • Electric Vortexmana cost reduced from 100/110/120/130 to 85

label: Sven
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage increased by 4
  • God's StrengthScepter aura bonus damage increased from 50/75/100% to 75/100/125%

label: Templar Assassin
descriptionHtml: • Refractionis now always visible

label: Terrorblade
descriptionHtml: • Enabled Terrorblade in Captains Mode

label: Tidehunter
descriptionHtml: • Added Scepter to Tidehunter

label: Timbersaw
descriptionHtml:
• Whirling Deathdebuff duration increased from 7 to 11
  • Whirling Death mana cost decreased from 70/80/90/100 to 70
  • Reactive Armorduration rescaled from 16 to 14/16/18/20

label: Tinker
descriptionHtml:
• Lasercast time improved from 0.53 to 0.4
  • Laser cast range increased from 550 to 650

label: Tiny
descriptionHtml: • Craggy Exteriornow triggers on attacks landing, rather than on start

label: Treant Protector
descriptionHtml:
• Leech Seedmana cost reduced from 100/110/120/130 to 80/95/110/125
  • OvergrowthAoE increased from 675 to 800
  • Scepter Overgrowth damage and vision AoE increased from 700 to 800

label: Troll Warlord
descriptionHtml:
• Fervorreduced from 20/25/30/35 to 15/20/25/30
  • Fervor max stacks increased from 4 to 6
  • Ranged Whirling Axescooldown reduced from 20/19/18/17 to 20/18/16/14

label: Tusk
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed reduced from 305 to 300
  • Ice Shardsdamage reduced from 70/140/210/280 to 60/120/180/240
  • Snowballcan no longer pull units out ofBlack HoleorChronosphere
  • Snowball gather radius reduced from 400 to 350

label: Undying
descriptionHtml:
• TombstoneZombiedamage reduced from 35 to 33
  • Tombstonebounty increased from 75/100/125/150 to 125/150/175/200
  • Tombstone no longer grants 44 XP

label: Ursa
descriptionHtml:
• Scepter added to Ursa
    • Allows you to cast your ultimate while disabled and reduces cooldown from 50/40/30 to 30/24/18 seconds
  • Enrageis no longer purgeable

label: Vengeful Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Added Scepter bonus to Vengeful Spirit
    • Causes you to spawn a Vengeance Illusion when you die
    • The Vengeance Illusion deals 50% damage, takes 150% damage, and is able to use all of your abilities (but not items)
    • The Vengeance Illusion lasts until she revives
    • Note: Still grants previous Scepter bonuses toNether Swap

label: Venomancer
descriptionHtml: • Venomous Galecooldown reduced from 22 to 21/20/19/18

label: Visage
descriptionHtml: • Stone FormAoE increased from 340 to 350

label: Warlock
descriptionHtml:
• Base strength increased by 4
  • Shadow Wordduration increased from 11 to 12 seconds

label: Weaver
descriptionHtml:
• Base damage increased by 3
  • The SwarmBeetles' Base Attack Time improved from 1.4/1.25/1.1/0.95 to 1.25/1.1/0.95/0.8

label: Windranger
descriptionHtml:
• Shackleshotis now disjointable
  • Shackleshot speed increased from 1515 to 1650
  • Shackleshot angle reduced from 26 degrees to 23 degrees
  • Powershotspeed no longer decreases by a small amount as it goes through units

label: Winter Wyvern
descriptionHtml:
• Temporarily removed from Captains Mode
  • Cold Embracecooldown increased from 17/16/15/14 to 24/21/18/15
  • Arctic Burnslow reduced from 25/30/35/40% to 19/26/33/40%
  • Winter's Curseprimary and secondary units are now immune to all damage from their enemies
  • Winter's Curse secondary units now have 50 attack speed bonus
  • Winter's Curse AoE increased increased from 400 to 500
  • Winter's Curse cooldown increased from 110/100/90 to 120/110/100
  • Winter's Curse duration increased from 2.5/3/3.5 to 3.25/4/4.75
  • Fixed Winter's Curse lingering if the primary target died

label: Witch Doctor
descriptionHtml:
• Maledictmana cost reduced from 120 to 105/110/115/120
  • Maledict cast range increased from 525 to 575

label: Wraith King
descriptionHtml: • Vampiric Auracan now be toggled to make the lifesteal for heroes only

label: Faerie Fire
descriptionHtml: • New consumable item,Faerie Fire

label: Dragon Lance
descriptionHtml: • New item formed fromOgre ClubandQuarterstaff

label: Aether Lens
descriptionHtml: • New item formed fromEnergy Booster,Ring of Health, andCloak

label: Iron Talon
descriptionHtml: • New item formed fromQuelling Blade,Ring of Protection, and aRecipe

label: Abyssal Blade
descriptionHtml:
• Bashdamage increased from 60 to 120
  • Damage bonus decreased from 85 to 70
  • The following items are related in their changes with bonus damage and proc damage being modified:
    • Abyssal Blade,Javelin,Monkey King Bar, andSkull Basher

label: Animal Courier
descriptionHtml:
• Courier purchase cooldown increased from 7 seconds to 2 minutes
  • Animal Courier cost decreased from 120 to 100

label: Arcane Boots
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed reduced by 5 and total cost reduced by 50(see Boots of Speed changes)
  • This applies to the following:
    • Boots of Speed,Arcane Boots,Phase Boots,Power Treads, andTranquil Boots

label: Assault Cuirass
descriptionHtml:
• Attack speed aura bonus now affects buildings
    • Armor portion already affects buildings

label: Blade Mail
descriptionHtml: • Cooldown reduced from 15 to 13

label: Boots of Speed
descriptionHtml:
• Cost reduced from 450 to 400
  • Movement speed reduced by 5
  • This applies to the following:
    • Boots of Speed,Arcane Boots,Phase Boots,Power Treads, andTranquil Boots

label: Bottle
descriptionHtml:
• Cost reduced from 700 to 660
  • Health regen per charge reduced from 110 to 90
  • Mana regen per charge reduced from 70 to 60
  • A charge now heals over 2.5 seconds instead of 3 seconds (total amount is still 90/60)
  • Added Bottle toSide Shop, starts with only 1 charge
    • As usual, if you use the item, you cannot sell it back for full price

label: Butterfly
descriptionHtml:
• Fluttermovement speed increased from 25 to 35%
  • Flutter duration reduced from 6 to 4 seconds

label: Clarity
descriptionHtml:
• Mana regeneration increased from 170 over 45 seconds to 190 over 50 seconds
    • Same mana regen per second

label: Cloak
descriptionHtml: • Magic resistance reduced from 20% to 15%

label: Crimson Guard
descriptionHtml:
• Crimson Guard chance from 75% to block 40/20 to 100% to block 32/16
  • Cooldown reduced from 70 to 60

label: Daedalus
descriptionHtml:
• Critical Strikefrom 25% chance for 2.4× to 30% chance for 2.2×
    • Average damage increase from 35% to 36%

label: Diffusal Blade
descriptionHtml:
• Agility bonus increased from 20/35 to 25/35
  • Intelligence bonus increased from 6/10 to 10/15

label: Drum of Endurance
descriptionHtml:
• Endurancebonus movement speed increased from 10% to 13%
    • Endurance is the active ability

label: Ethereal Blade
descriptionHtml: • Mana cost reduced from 150 to 100

label: Flying Courier
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 220 to 200

label: Glimmer Cape
descriptionHtml: • Base magic resistance reduced from 20% to 15%

label: Heart of Tarrasque
descriptionHtml: • HP regeneration increased from 4% to 4.75%

label: Helm of the Dominator
descriptionHtml: • Dominatenow sets the dominated creeps' base movement speed to 350

label: Hood of Defiance
descriptionHtml: • Hood of Defiance now has an active ability

label: Iron Branch
descriptionHtml: • Can now be used by targeting the ground, planting a happy little tree that lasts 20 seconds. 200 Cast Range.

label: Javelin
descriptionHtml:
• Pierceimproved from 20% to deal 40 damage to 25% to deal 85 bonus damage
  • Damage bonus reduced from 21 to 10
  • The following items are related in their changes with bonus damage and proc damage being modified:
    • Abyssal Blade,Javelin,Monkey King Bar, andSkull Basher

label: Linken's Sphere
descriptionHtml:
• Cooldown reduced from 16 to 13
  • Damage bonus increased from 10 to 15

label: Mantle of Intelligence
descriptionHtml: • Removed fromSide Shop

label: Monkey King Bar
descriptionHtml:
• Mini-Bashproc damage increased from 100 to 160
  • Damage bonus reduced from 88 to 66
  • The following items are related in their changes with bonus damage and proc damage being modified:
    • Abyssal Blade,Javelin,Monkey King Bar, andSkull Basher

label: Necronomicon
descriptionHtml:
• Recipe cost reduced from 1250 to 1200
  • Necronomicon Archerattack range increased from 350/450/550 to 450/500/550

label: Observer and Sentry Wards
descriptionHtml:
• Observer and Sentry Wards now have an AoE indicator before placing
    • They also use a new UI for placement

label: Observer Ward
descriptionHtml: • Experience bounty increased from 50 to 100

label: Octarine Core
descriptionHtml: • Now affects the replenish time of charged abilities

label: Orb of Venom
descriptionHtml: • Orb of Venom is no longer aUnique Attack Modifier

label: Phase Boots
descriptionHtml:
• Phaseactive no longer cancels when casting
  • Movement speed reduced by 5 and total cost reduced by 50(see Boots of Speed changes)
  • This applies to the following:
    • Boots of Speed,Arcane Boots,Phase Boots,Power Treads, andTranquil Boots

label: Power Treads
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed reduced by 5 and total cost reduced by 50(see Boots of Speed changes)
  • This applies to the following:
    • Boots of Speed,Arcane Boots,Phase Boots,Power Treads, andTranquil Boots

label: Quelling Blade
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 225 to 200

label: Ring of Protection
descriptionHtml:
• Cost reduced from 200 to 175
  • Armor bonus reduced from 3 to 2

label: Rod of Atos
descriptionHtml:
• Cripplecooldown increased from 10 to 12
  • Cripple now grants units that attack the target 40%accuracy
    • This means that targets attacking that unit will not miss 40% of the time

label: Sange
descriptionHtml: • Maimno longer piercesSpell Immunity

label: Sange and Yasha
descriptionHtml: • Greater Maimno longer piercesSpell Immunity

label: Satanic
descriptionHtml: • Duration increased from 4 to 4.5

label: Scythe of Vyse
descriptionHtml: • Hexcooldown reduced from 30 to 25

label: Silver Edge
descriptionHtml: • Silver Edge debuff is no longer dispellable

label: Skull Basher
descriptionHtml:
• Strength bonus increased from 8 to 10
  • Bash damage increased from 60 to 120
  • Damage reduced from 25 to 10
  • The following items are related in their changes with bonus damage and proc damage being modified:
    • Abyssal Blade,Javelin,Monkey King Bar, andSkull Basher

label: Smoke of Deceit
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 100 to 50

label: Tango
descriptionHtml:
• Boosted Tangoes now last for double the duration instead of providing double the healing rate
  • Using Tango on Iron Branch trees provides double healing duration

label: Tranquil Boots
descriptionHtml:
• Tranquil Boots armor reduced from 4 to 3
  • Movement speed reduced by 5(see Boots of Speed changes)
  • This applies to the following:
    • Boots of Speed,Arcane Boots,Phase Boots,Power Treads, andTranquil Boots

label: Vanguard
descriptionHtml: • Vanguard chance from 75% to block 40/20 to 100% to block 32/16

label: Veil of Discord
descriptionHtml: • Now requires 2×Robe of the Magiinstead of a 900 gold recipe (Int bonus increased by 12)

label: Vitality Booster
descriptionHtml: • Added toSide Shop

label: Ultimate Orb
descriptionHtml: • Removed fromSide Shop

label: Yasha
descriptionHtml:
• Movement speed bonus reduced from 10% to 8%
    • Sange and YashaandMantaare unchanged
